entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few showers this evening then 60 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain. High 7 except plus 4 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning in the morning. Fog patches developing in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High 7 except plus 4 along parts of the coast. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 7 May 2023
